channel.title: Half-Life graphics help
channel.description:
Ok,the title may be a little misleading. I wanted to ask f anyone knew of a way to make things stay longer in Half-Life. Like spent brass, blood, corpses, decals, etc. I know it's possible, Half-Life Uplink Extended had almost all of these things, at least, the shells seemed to never disappear. I looked every where for a way to do this with no luck. So, can any of you help.
Half-Life Uplink Extended: [url='https://www.planetphillip.com/posts/uplink-extended-half-life/']https://www.planetphillip.com/posts/uplink-extended-half-life/[/url]

item.title: Half-Life graphics help
item.dc:creator: CaLeB
item.description:
Doom300:

They make the Decals in game short so they don’t lag you computer. But that’s only safety precautions.

Someone’s forgetting what year we’re in…

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life graphics help
item.dc:creator: bulbman
item.description:
Doom300:

They make the Decals in game short so they don’t lag you computer. But that’s only safety precautions.

I know that, however, I’m sure my rig just might be able to handle, mabye.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life graphics help
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I’m pretty sure old decals disappear as new ones show up, this goes for blood too, so mp_decals with a really high number should work. I’ve never tried though.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life graphics help
item.dc:creator: bulbman
item.description:
Ok,the title may be a little misleading. I wanted to ask f anyone knew of a way to make things stay longer in Half-Life. Like spent brass, blood, corpses, decals, etc. I know it’s possible, Half-Life Uplink Extended had almost all of these things, at least, the shells seemed to never disappear. I looked every where for a way to do this with no luck. So, can any of you help.

Half-Life Uplink Extended:
https://www.planetphillip.com/posts/uplink-extended-half-life/

Read full topic
